title: What is League of Memory?

embed.description: League of Memory is memory matching game where you match champion's icon with it's sound! League of Memory will take you on the next level in the world of fun. Easy and simple to play in many languages. Try it now for free!

body:
League of Memory is memory matching game where you match champion's icon with it's sound!

League of Memory will take you on the next level in the world of fun. Easy and simple to play in many languages. Try it now for free!

Download on Android FOR FREE:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=unique_lol_apps.leagueofmemory

Features:

* All champions included and all sounds
* Suppored many languages
* Leaderboard for every division
* Achievements
* Designed for all ages
* Level of fun - Over 9000

Follow me on Facebook:
Unique LoL Apps
https://www.facebook.com/uniquelolapps/

P.S. More languages coming soon

Thanks to Riot Games Inc for allowing me to use their Intellectual Property.

replies.body: Hi! I downloaded this and it seems pretty fun, Two things though, classic memory games show the pieces before you look for them, thats why it's called memory... And another thing is I got promoted to bronze twice, how come? But yeah! Pretty nice.
Fixed the bug with the version 1.1.1. Thank you very much for reporting it and you got your name in the credits :)
Nice man, good luck with your game ^_^

Thank you very very much for your review. Thank you for reporting the bug. I see the line of code that caused that and I will fix it very soon.

Thanks for playing. Have a nice day :) Greetings
